subject: [junit] how to define testing criteria
msgSnippet: hi all. how can you define your own testing criteria in JUnit? i think there s a way and i thought i read about it somewhere but i m blanking out. regards,
messageBody:
hi all.
how can you define your own testing criteria in JUnit?
i think there's a way and i thought i read about it somewhere but i'm
blanking out.

regards,
